a fair hearing my aim is to cement
Britain as a close partner of the EU
once we have left and the UK will
continue to face similar challenges to
our European neighbours we will continue
to share the same values and so I want a
mature cooperative relationship with our
European partners do you really expect

to keep listening to Britain when we are
quitting are they entitled actually to
ignore us now but as long as we're
members of the European Union we will
continue to meet our rights and
obligations as as members of the

done sitting around the table today I

check has all experienced she knows the

EU we want to divorce but we won't move

call the shots Theresa May is keen to
